posts.author: John
posts.body: Lost my laptop in the library yesterday evening. It's a silver MacBook Pro. If found, please contact me. Reward offered for its safe return.

posts.author: Maria
posts.body: Looking for a math tutor to help with Calculus II. Willing to pay $20 per hour. Please message me if interested.

posts.author: David
posts.body: Looking for a roommate to share a 2-bedroom apartment near campus. Rent is affordable, and utilities are split. If interested, please DM me for more details.

posts.author: Lisa
posts.body: Join us for a fun movie night this Friday at the student center. We'll be screening the latest blockbuster film. Free popcorn and drinks provided. Don't miss out!

posts.author: John
posts.body: Join us for a thrilling movie night this Saturday at the student center. We'll be screening a classic action film. Free snacks and beverages provided. Don't miss it!

posts.author: Daniel
posts.body: Join us for a coding workshop this Sunday at the student center. We'll be covering the basics of HTML and CSS. No prior experience required.
